mapper.update: update area_cinemas set cinema_money = cinema_money + #{money} where id = #{cinemaId}
update area_cinemas set cinema_money = cinema_money - #{money} where id = #{cinemaId}
mapper.select: select ac.*,cm.movie_lowMoney lm from area_cinemas ac join cinema_movies cm on ac.id = cm.cinema_id where cm.movie_id = #{movieId}
